level.heading: Minutes of commissioner; when evidence.
level.text: ยง 14-138 Minutes of commissioner; when evidence. A copy of the minutes of the commissioner or of any part of such minutes, or of any order or resolution of the commissioner, or of the rules and regulations established by him or her when certified by the commissioner or the chief clerk, or first deputy clerk of the department, may be given in evidence upon any trial, investigation, hearing or proceeding in any court, or before any tribunal, commissioner or commissioners, or board, with the same force and effect as the original.
